entry.title: Python software engineer
entry.summary: Sqreen is hiring Python software engineers to build game changing protection technologies.
entry.content:
Company Summary
Sqreen brings extraordinary self-healing technologies leveraging real-time adaptative capabilities. Sqreen defenses continuously adapt and improve from rules and attacks sourced from our community.

Our team is made up of passionate, smart and open-minded people dedicated to making the Internet a safer place. At Sqreen, we love code, we love security, and we work on revolutionizing the way applications are protected. You will join a highly technical and product-driven team and contribute to an extraordinary game changing technology.

Sqreen contributes to the Open Source community. Much of our work is shared in conferences, meetups and articles. Our work environment is modern, casual, and respectful. Our engineering team is based in Paris.

Position Summary
Candidate will be responsible of designing and developing Sqreen key features of client security components, as well as backend infrastructure.

Code will reach production fast using modern development methods and tools. Sqreen platform brings cutting edge technologies to solve complex issues in the simplest form. Candidate will have a high consideration of reliability, low-latency, redundancy, and security.

Our engineers have deep impacts on our products and contribute in protecting millions of products. The candidate will be a key contributor of the engineering team at Sqreen, delivering the best solutions to protect applications.

 

 

Technical Qualifications

  • Strong experience with Python and/or Ruby programming
  • Experience on various cloud services (e.g., AWS, Google cloud, etc.)
  • Proficient with Linux on both bare-metal and virtualized environments
  • Ability to design custom protocols, services and frameworks
  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in computer science or computer engineering

Responsibilities will include

  • Driving architectural design changes with the engineering team
  • Implementing and unit testing software modules and/or features
  • Producing technical documentation with shipped software components
  • Translating technical requirements to engineering tasks
  • Estimating efforts for engineering tasks
  • Proactively keeping current with relevant technical trends, techniques, tools and systems
